alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 8:40AM MDT until June 17 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Mitchell. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, the lower banks overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CDT Sunday was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to fall slowly, with a fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed James River Mitchell 17.0 17.4 Sun 8 am 17.3 17.3 17.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1145 AM CDT.
